home.title: The events you know. Built for AI-powered applications.
home.purpose: Rohas simplifies building event-driven applications by providing a schema-driven development approach that generates type-safe code and handles the complexity of event orchestration.
home.description: Build scalable event-driven applications with schema-driven development. Support for Python and TypeScript runtimes, multiple event adapters, and powerful code generation.

schemaDriven.title: Schema-Driven Development
schemaDriven.description: Define your APIs, events, models, and cron jobs using simple schema files. Rohas generates type-safe code automatically.

multiRuntime.title: Multi-Runtime Support
multiRuntime.description: Write handlers in Python or TypeScript/Node.js. Choose the language that fits your team.

adapters.title: Event Adapters
adapters.description: Connect to NATS, Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS, or use in-memory adapters for development.

hotReload.title: Hot Reload
hotReload.description: Development server with automatic reloading. See your changes instantly.

codegen.title: Code Generation
codegen.description: Auto-generate type-safe interfaces, handler stubs, and boilerplate code from your schemas.

telemetry.title: Built-in Telemetry
telemetry.description: Integrated tracing, metrics, and logging. Monitor your workflows with ease.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Learn how to build event-driven applications with Rohas.

examples.title: Examples
examples.description: Explore example projects to learn how to build event-driven applications with Rohas.
